review: For the price it works great on my parents' TV. I use it to show them various YouTube videos on the large screen. Occasionally I use separate apps like Localcast to show photos or videos saved on my phone. I liked it so much I bought another to use on my own TV and until I invested in a Chromebox I used it extensively to watch YouTube videos controlled by my Galaxy S4.
